verses.name: Job 42:12
verses.text: So the Lord blessed the latter end of Job more than his beginning: for he had fourteen thousand sheep, and six thousand camels, and a thousand yoke of oxen, and a thousand she asses.

verses.name: Job 42:13
verses.text: He had also seven sons and three daughters.

verses.name: Job 42:14
verses.text: And he called the name of the first, Jemima; and the name of the second, Kezia; and the name of the third, Keren–happuch.

verses.name: Job 42:15
verses.text: And in all the land were no women found so fair as the daughters of Job: and their father gave them inheritance among their brethren.
